title: Who came up with the awesome idea of Ice Cream Trucks?
description:
50% Off the best monthly science kits - Back to School Special! "I love MEL Science" - Trusty Narrator. Go to MEL Science and use promo code WHOSMARTED50. Offer expires Sept 23.

When did Ice Cream Trucks become a thing? Why did early ice cream carts make people sick? Why does most ice cream from a truck come on a stick?

For free home activities sign-up at www.WhoSmarted.com
